name: Qrinventory
tagline: Lightweight inventory system to use among people of trust and using smartphones for scanning.
body:
1. Take a QR tag in the labels box (adhesive labels also available)
2. Put it on the object to track
3. Scan the label
4. Fill in the form 
5. You're done!

To borrow a tool, just scan the label and click "I am borrowing this tool"

To give back a tool, just scan the label and click "I am returning this tool"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
